actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-835.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the agreeing to the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 9378) to amend title IV of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to postpone, for 2 years, the date on which the corporation first begins paying benefits under terminated multiemployer plans.

summary.text: Directs agreement by the House to the Senate amendments to H.R. 9378 (Employee Retirement Income Security Act amendments).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the agreeing to the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 9378) to amend title IV of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to postpone, for 2 years, the date on which the corporation first begins paying benefits under terminated multiemployer plans.
